TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_rmanga'_zyay', title = rmanga'_zyay', year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/rmanga'_zyay'} }

S.FORM: rmanga' zyay' hya' ga rmanga' na kana inbzinah inlungan nqu mkrakis qasa, ini' ga yaqu yaya' na laqi' qasa qu kana inbzinah inlungan naha' maha qu imi' na kay' qani. yalaw gi kya kruma' hya' ga ana maha qutux byacing rnanga' naha' ga, mutuw minbzinah lawziy na' qu inlingan na lpyung, nanu' yasa quw rmanga zyay' qaniy hya' ga, yaquw aki' naha' sawn maha mhway qu lpyung qani maha lga, mutuw naha' blaq lnglungun maha aw' blaq na lpyung qu lpyung qaniy, ruw mutuw si swayal kya la. kya kruma' ga, bsyaq hazi' qu rinngan na lpyung lga, msayux lga mutuw si swayal maha wahiy magal ina' mamu la, yan nasa lga, mutuw t'aring kya pnaynama' mtzyuwaw na agal naha' sa ina' naha' kya la.

rmanga' zyay' hya' ga rmanga' na kana inbzinah inlongan nqo mkrakis qasa, ini' ga yaqo yaya' na laqi' qasa qo kana inbzinah inlongan naha' maha qo imi' na kay' qani. yalaw gi kya kroma' hya' ga ana maha qotox byacing rnanga' naha' ga, motow minbzinah lawziy na' qo inlingan na lpyong, nano' yasa qow rmanga zyay' qaniy hya' ga, yaqow aki' naha' sawn maha mhway qo lpyong qani maha lga, motow naha' blaq lnglongon maha aw' blaq na lpyong qo lpyong qaniy, row motow si swayal kya la. kya kroma' ga, bsyaq hazi' qo rinngan na lpyong lga, msayox lga motow si swayal maha wahiy magal ina' mamo la, yan nasa lga, motow t'aring kya pnaynama' mtzyowaw na agal naha' sa ina' naha' kya la.
